page.title: 11TYTHERINGTON JOBS
page.content: In{1985}the range of jobs in{ {Tytherington}includes{office work, {shop work, farming, delivery}of goods from house to house selling bread, milk, eggs, fish and cream,{factory {work, quarry work, social work, {nursing,}and{craft-work}which is done at home. The average distance travelled to work each day from the village is between { {5}and{10}miles. Some of the people who live in the village have to travel long distances to get to their place of work. There are more jobs for women than for men in{Tytherington.}Most of the work which is done by men is{farming}and { {quarry work.}The work done by women is {office work, shop work}and{delivery {work.}
